DOC.brief_summary: This open-label study patient metastatic breast cancer evaluate antitumor activity safety weekly dose-dense paclitaxel liposome injection compare 3-weekly regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Weekly Every 3 Week Administration Paclitaxel Liposome Injection Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Female Male > 18 year age < 70years age , If female childbearing potential , pregnancy test negative first dose study drug agree use acceptable method birth control avoid pregnancy duration study Stage IV disease Measurable disease Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 02 . Suitable treatment paclitaxel single agent regimen ( first line prior first line chemotherapy include adriamycin allow , If taxane part adjuvant regimen , least one year transpire since completion taxane regimen Her2+ patient , Herceptin therapy allow . Patient follow value Baseline : Absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1.5 x 10^9cells/L ; platelet ≥ 100 x 10^9 cells/L ; hemoglobin ≥ 10 g/dL . Aspartate transaminase ( AST SGOT ) , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT SGPT ) ≤ 2.5x upper limit normal range ( ULN ) ; total bilirubin ≤ 1.5ULN ; creatinine ≤ 1.5 mg/dL . Informed consent obtain . Parenchymal brain metastasis . History malignancy within last 3 year New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Grade 2 great congestive heart failure , history myocardial infarction unstable angina new occur angina within 6 month prior study enrollment . Concurrent anticancer therapy . History serious organic disorder ( include active infection Cardiovascular disease ) , serious hepatic disease , serious blood coagulation disease , cachexia Sensory neuropathy > Grade 1 baseline . Patients prior hypersensitivity paclitaxel Pregnant nursing woman enrol different clinical study No psychiatric illness situation would limit compliance study
